Author: Tankysaurus
Text: That's not a bad idea, thanks for the help.

Author: countdowntocontrol
Text: You sound exactly like me.  I'm so sorry you're feeling this way.  I'm still struggling and I'm back to really bad habits right now, but something that stabilised me, at least for a little while, and helped with my mood and energy, was upping my restriction intake and exercising.  I ate the exact same thing every day - having to choose what I eat from meal to meal overwhelms me and can trigger a binge, and the consistency took a lot of the anxiety off of me.  I ate high protein and fiber, moderate carb, and it wasn't perfect, but it gave me time to escape the binge/restrict cycle and the energy to see people and do things.  I hope this is even a little bit helpful.  If you want to talk, shoot me a message.  Feel better soon!
